title: Exploring Cargo Workspaces in Rust
description: In this lab, we will explore Cargo's workspaces feature, which helps manage multiple related packages developed in tandem by splitting a package into multiple library crates.

meta.keywords: Cargo Workspaces, Rust Book, LabEx, Rust Programming, Package Management
